divs: sighting detailsmy middle child (6 at the time) says she woke up in the middle of the night this past summer and came in the living room and saw a human like entity looking at her through the window from the outside. she said it looked white\gray w\ big black eyes and it was waving at her. i also feel like im being watched sometimes by something i cannot see.
Summary: Daughter saw alien peering through window
